seo.title: Vernazza Hiking Trails 2025 | Best Routes in Cinque Terre
seo.description: Discover the best hiking trails from Vernazza. Routes to Monterosso, Corniglia, and scenic mountain sanctuaries with stunning coastal views.

body.title: Hiking Trails from Vernazza
body.subtitle: Experience the most spectacular coastal and mountain trails. Vernazza is the perfect base for exploring Cinque Terre's famous hiking routes.

features.title: Vernazza to Monterosso
features.description: 2-hour coastal route with stunning views. Most popular trail.

features.title: Vernazza to Corniglia
features.description: 90-minute high trail through vineyards and olive groves.

features.title: Reggio Sanctuary
features.description: Mountain pilgrimage path with panoramic coastal views.

features.title: Prevo Loop
features.description: Circular route above the village through wine terraces.

features.title: Difficulty Range
features.description: From moderate coastal paths to challenging mountain routes.

features.title: Cinque Terre Card
features.description: Required for main coastal trails between villages.
